lines.text: Here comes fucking Parker, walking down nine miles, swinging the God damn head by the hair in one hand and his sandwich in the other.
I'm just crazy about this store.
There's gonna be one more killing here tonight.
I swear to God. If my brother hadn't hit him in the head repeatedly with a blender, he would've killed me!
Yeah, uh... a Hamilton Beach Blender.
This creep keeps calling, he's driving us nuts

[Making out with her co-worker on one of the checkouts]
We're gonna get into so much trouble
I couldn't let ANYONE get in the way... and... I guess I got a little carried away!
